page.title: 03General Information Two
page.content:
{Chandler's Ford}is a residential area and there are some places of woodland.
It has 8 schools 3 are private, 2 are Primary and 3 Secondary. There are several small general stores and 3 different denominations of church. They are Church of England, U.R.C. and a Methodist Church. There are 2 doctors surgeries and a few dentists.
There are lots of Brownie and Cub Packs and other clubs for all.
There are pubs and restaurants and we have 3 recreation grounds. There is an old peoples home called Hillside Close. Leigh House is a nursing home for adolescent children.
Chandler's Ford is pleasant to live in because it is clean and quiet.
